author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Adverum Biotechnologies Announces Long-Term Preclinical Efficacy Data On ADVM-022 Gene Therapy In Wet AMD
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Adverum Biotechnologies Inc:
* ADVERUM BIOTECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES LONG-TERM PRECLINICAL EFFICACY DATA ON ADVM-022 GENE THERAPY IN WET AMD
* ADVERUM BIOTECHNOLOGIES - 13-MONTH DATA SHOW EFFICACY, DURABILITY OF PROTEIN EXPRESSION FOLLOWING A SINGLE INTRAVITREAL ADMINISTRATION OF ADVM-022
* ADVERUM BIOTECHNOLOGIES INC - ADVM-022 WAS WELL TOLERATED, WITH NO SERIOUS ADVERSE EVENTS IN STUDY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
